keyword: how many calories are in a small orange
title: How Many Calories in a Small Orange?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a small orange, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and other nutrients on a per-fruit basis with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Small Orange?
assumptions: Small fresh orange (~96 g edible portion), raw, navel or similar variety, without peel.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, size, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specific produce.

quick_answer.text: A small orange provides about 45 kcal, 11 g carbs, and 2.3 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Eat with peel (adds fiber and slight calories)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a small orange?
faqs.a: Approximately 45 kcal for one small orange.

faqs.q: What is the fiber content in a small orange?
faqs.a: About 2.3 g of dietary fiber per small orange.

faqs.q: Does a small orange have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.9 g protein and 0.1 g fat.

faqs.q: How do sugars in oranges compare to other fruits?
faqs.a: A small orange has ~9 g natural sugars, mostly from fructose.
Yes, 11.3 g total carbs, but high in fiber, netting ~9 g.
